评论详情: I love this sweatshirt.  It is very stylish and oversized.  I love the softness inside and out.  The leopard printed star looks great.  It is 100% polyester, so it won't shrink.  I got the blue color and it is a very dark navy blue.  I really like this sweatshirt and highly recommend it.
I like how thin it is bc I’m usually always hot. The texture is odd but good at the same time! Fits good I got a medium
Not a good quality..star was an iron on..
